definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
(bound form) mostly used in either 冘豫[you2 yu4] or 冘疑[you2 yi2]
Shenyang subprovincial city and capital of Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China/old names include Fengtian 奉天, Shengjing 盛京 and Mukden
Shenyang subprovincial city and capital of Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China/old names include Fengtian 奉天, Shengjing 盛京 and Mukden
Shenhe district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning
Shen Guofang (1952-), PRC assistant minister of foreign affairs (2003-2005)
Liaoshen Campaign (Sep-Nov 1948), the first of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War
Shenqiu county in Zhoukou 周口[Zhou1 kou3], Henan
Shenqiu county in Zhoukou 周口[Zhou1 kou3], Henan
Shenbeixin district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning
Shen Baozhen (1820-1879), Qing Minister of the Navy, founded Fuzhou Naval College 船政學堂|船政学堂[Chuan2 zheng4 Xue2 tang2] in 1866
Shen Ying of Wu, governor (268-280) of coastal province of Wu and compiler of Seaboard Geographic Gazetteer 臨海水土誌|临海水土志
Shen Fu (1763-c. 1810), Qing dynasty writer, author of Six Records of a Floating Life 浮生六記|浮生六记[Fu2 Sheng1 Liu4 Ji4]
Shenbeixin district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning

sentences.english: Cheng says her mother was an advocate of this style of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 沈婆婆说她母亲是这种服装的支持者。

sentences.english: This young man's name is Lu Yan. He is Shen Hongmei's boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 这位小伙子叫吕岩，他是沈红梅的男朋友。

sentences.english: Shen, of course, smiled all the more defiantly.
sentences.chinese: 当然，沈还在挑战性地笑。

sentences.english: She looked up at the lowering sky.
Shen who come here, did not want to destroy the life of mann.
sentences.chinese: 沈凡此来，本来就没有想过要破坏曼华的生活。

sentences.english: Junruo concubine Yang road dust, if the turbidity cement, floating and sinking of different potential, when harmonic meet?
sentences.chinese: 君若扬路尘，妾若浊水泥，浮沈各异势，会合何时谐？

sentences.english: Whoms in sin shall sink in sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 在罪恶中游泳的人，必将在悲哀中沈没。

sentences.english: My English teacher is a gracious woman surnamed Shen.
sentences.chinese: 老师是一位姓沈的非常热心的女士。

sentences.english: The five lakes tour, the worry everywhere, Floating and sinking through the ages, and who asked the east?
sentences.chinese: 落日五湖游，烟波处处愁。浮沈千古事，谁与问东流？

sentences.english: Shen Hongmei is from Bazhong, Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 沈红梅，来自四川巴中地区。

sentences.english: Professor Shen asked me whether I had completed my written assignment.
sentences.chinese: 沈教授问我是否已经完成了书面作业。

sentences.english: So upon that stricken multitude grim melancholy sat.
sentences.chinese: 所以，丧气的观众有著阴沈的忧伤。
我能用一下电话吗？我姓沈。

sentences.english: Mulan went to the hospital to visit professor shen, professor shen died.
sentences.chinese: 木兰去医院看望沈教授，没想到沈教授病逝。

sentences.english: Mulan went to the hospital to visit professor shen, professor shen died.
sentences.chinese: 木兰去医院看望沈教授，没想到沈教授病逝。

definition: surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Xue/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
